name: CardFight!! Vanguard G: Stride to Victory!!
overview: The third installment of the TV anime series based on the hottest trading card game "Cardfight!! Vanguard" is here! Aim to win the national tournament with familiar characters such as Shindo Chrono! In addition to supporting the new abilities "Legion" and "Stride" for the first time in the game, the number of recorded cards has been increased to about 3800! In addition, communication battles where you can enjoy battles anytime and anywhere, and tutorials that even beginners can learn the rules while playing the game will continue to be installed! In addition, you can enjoy the original story of the characters from the anime "Vanguard His Legion Mate Edition"!
